QuestData.Title: War is Deception
QuestData.Description:
You have proven a useful ally, $n.
Mephiles undoubtedly possesses a wealth of information for us. However, the House of Rituals is unforgiving when it comes to betrayal. He will not talk.
Not that it matters. The House of Eyes has ways to... extract a prisoner's knowledge without the use of words.
Place the charged crystals around me. They will facilitate the interrogation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Prepare to interrogate Mephiles the Loyal.
QuestData.RewardText: Draka may be content to forget our master, but I will not rest until he is avenged.
